newsitem.title: USA: Eltrax Systems ends talks with Hi-Tech.
newsitem.headline: Eltrax Systems ends talks with Hi-Tech.

text.p: Eltrax Systems Inc said Friday it has abandoned merger talks with Hi-Tech Connections Inc of Reading, Pa.

In March, Eltrax announced it had reached an agreement in principle to acquire Hi-Tech Connections, a data network systems integration and network management company. Hi-Tech had about $9.2 million in revenue for the fiscal year ended September 30.
But the company said it and Hi-Tech have terminated their letter of intent and abandoned merger discussions following completion of a due diligence review.

"We are disappointed in the cancellation of the Hi-TECH transaction, but we feel that this result is in the best interests of our company and our shareholders," William O'Reilly, Eltrax's chairman, said in a statement.

Meantime, Eltrax said it has completed its due diligence review of EJG Techline Inc and the deal is scheduled to close May 14. Techline will be the fourth acquisition completed by Eltrax in the past year, it said.
